StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetBARByPersonID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int AS
SELECT [BAR_ID] ,[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[SCHEDULED_BAR_DATE] ,[BAR_ADMISSION_STATUS] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[BAR] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId ORDER by [SCHEDULED_BAR_DATE] ASC
